Massive Computational Experiments, Painlessly (STATS 285)

Stanford University, Fall 2017

Here you will find a list of readings for this course

  • Making Massive Computational Experiments Painless
  • 50 years of Data Science
  • The vision of autonomic computing
  • Globus platform-as-a-service for collaborative science applications
  • Occupy the Cloud: Distributed Computing for the 99%
  • Reproducible Research in Computational Harmonic Analysis
  • Reproducibility
  • Enhancing Reproducibility for Computational Methods
  • The Legal Framework for Reproducible Scientic Research
  • Data Age 2025, IDC
